comments: Prof Fenlon\'s Intro to Management class was not difficult.He hands out a sheet of paper with notes for every chapter.No HW.Four 1-question short-answer quizzes.1 group project that was a 3-page report,ungraded presentation.Midterm&final.U don\'t really need the book unless u want to use it as a study guide.Nice guy,always willing 2 answer questions.

He is a tough teacher! This is coming from a physics person. I thought definitely do not recommend this guy he goes off on incredibly boring tangents, gives out pop quizzes that are not related to anything! For the exams he grades strictly! I used examples he said over and over in class and still got a 74. Seriously, my Calc3 class was easier!
This man will put you to sleep with all his personal stories that are ridiculously boring. Also, he gives "pop" quizzes once a week that are impossible to get a 100 on.
